Articles.Content:
As you all know, there are billions of games out there... but only a few of them are not Shooters.

Show off your favourite Non-Shooter games! I'll start off:

- Kerbal Space Program (of course, but it is THE BEST)

- Nitronic Rush

- FTL

- Garrys Mod (ok, there are Weapons, but it's a cool Sandbox anyway)

- Rigs of Rods

Now its your turn!

EDIT: For all free downloadable games a link would be cool so everyone can play!

Edited May 28, 2013 by MarkusA380
I could list like 75% of my steam library here.

Simcity 4.

KSP.

FTL.

Lunar flight.

Spore.

Wildfire Alpha.

Don't starve.

Garry's mod.

I'm abit confused by "Shooter" would portal count as a shooter? Or civ Iv?
Portal is a first person puzzle game. CIV IV is a turn-based strategy game, and not even close to a shooter. O.o
Do you mean non-violence or just non-shooter?

Do you mean non-violence or just non-shooter?

Just non-shooter games... otherwise you even couldn't post KSP... many Kerbals die there...
KSP, Sim City 4, Race Into Space, Civ 4, Star Wars: Empire At War, Masters of the World (fairly obscure political sim), Learn To Play Chess With Fritz And Chester.
KSP, Star Wars: Empire at war, Roller Coaster Tycoon 3, Papers Please, Simcity 4, Sims 3 and Openttd. I'm sure I have more, I just can't think of them now
My entire steam library, all Strategy games or KSP then.
Call of duty, Battlefield, Team fortress. Left for dead. planetside. counterstrike, garrys mod.

Call of duty, Battlefield, Team fortress. Left for dead. planetside. counterstrike, garrys mod.

Non-shooter.
Call of flowers, Flowerfeild, Left for cats, walrusside, counter cat, Bobs mod.
Most zelda games, both Mario galaxy's and 64, portal,civ 3, KSP, practically all my steam library.

Call of duty, Battlefield, Team fortress. Left for dead. planetside. counterstrike, garrys mod.

Sorry but what do you understand of NON-SHOOTER games? CoD, Battlefield, TF, Planetside, counterstrike are ALL pure shooters!!
Calm down, he was probably being ironic
Garry's mod, KSP, FTL, Portal, Portal 2, Terraria, Plants vs. Zombies,(opens up Steam to see more games), Cogs, Crayon Physics Deluxe, VVVVV and more I can't think of.

Portal, Portal 2 (unless you count the portal gun) Mass Effect Series (I purely play it for the storyline, if I could get a version without the shooting I would) SpaceChem, you know what, I don't want to list most of my 56 steam games. Just go ask everyone else, or look in my steam profile.

Portal
